text: Ruth Gavison (; March 28, 1945 â€“ August 15, 2020) was an Israeli Law professor. She was born in Jerusalem. She worked at the Hebrew University of Jerusalem. She was a member of the Israel Academy of Sciences and Humanities. In 2011, she won the Israel Prize. Gavison was nominated for a position on Israel's Supreme Court in 2005 but failed to secure a majority for the appointment.Zeev Segal, "Choose the best judge for the job", HaAretz 23 September 2008 Gavison died on August 15, 2020 in Jerusalem at the age of 75. ==References== Category:1945 births Category:2020 deaths Category:Israeli lawyers Category:Hebrew University of Jerusalem faculty Category:Lawyers from Jerusalem
title: Ruth Gavison
